turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get four medium pizzas from Bella Luna with extra cheese on all of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: mushrooms, anchovies, and spinach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas with extra cheese, with mushroom, anchovies and spinach, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $80 ,is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivered, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzaas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.
